segments.text: I see the woman drying that plate like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even seem to notice the water all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how focused she is on something so small.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really going for it, stretching as far as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he’s done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, like she knows he’ll share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like someone should tell them to be careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
